name: Escape Rave Forest
description:
Made this in three days. I had a lot of fun making it.

Features:

- Game Length: 2 - 3 minutes

- 1 Nonbinary Raccoon

- 8 unique rough ms paint style drawings that I took like 30 minutes each to make.

Content Warnings:

- Very Very Mild Cartoony Gore. [blood]

-  Bright clashing colours [Text and Images]

Credits:

- Art/Characters/Writing: NamelessMewMew/Me.

- You! For checking this out!
